Reviews.Title: “Cheap, cheerful and delivers what it promises!”

Reviews.Content: girlfriends dad booked stay hotel night short weekend trip amsterdam firstly budget looking luxury sleep stay heart amsterdam basic clean comfortable hotel perfect amsterdam days sight sitting hotel watching tv booking aware literally red light district noisy periods short bursts constant noise red light district starts busy night six morning didnt matter day travelling sight seeing able sleep scenarios common sense realise red light district whinge noise straight forward check process walked bar key paid time leave hand key bar maid request arrival simple isnt fantastic pay beds low bit futon comfy suprised found wasnt shared bathroom shower facilities key own bathroom literally steps corridor steep stairs disabled mobility hotel overall disadvantages didnt bother slightest depends person circumstances similar trip amsterdam wouldnt hesitate stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: VodkaQueenLeicester
Reviews.Content: brilliant location hotel red light district basic price website slightly misleading provided shower toilet shared facilities leave 20 euro deposit remote control tv didnt watch tv didnt bother steps extremely steep bear mind trouble stairs didnt breakfast cant comment looking nice clean comfy basic price look
